examples: He's a kind and generous man.
The man at the store helped me find what I was looking for.

suggested: Why did the man put his money in the freezer? He wanted cold hard cash!
The societal pressures of toxic masculinity can lead to a sense of isolation and depression for some men.
Feeling angry and frustrated with the lack of progress towards gender equality can motivate men to become better allies.
Surprising a loved one with a thoughtful gesture can help break down traditional gender norms and expectations.
The smell of a freshly lit cigar can be associated with traditional masculinity.
The feeling of a strong handshake can convey confidence and assertiveness.
The connection to other men and a shared sense of identity and experience can be found in men's groups and support networks.
